name: annoyed birds
description:
If the game freezes, press menu>restart

The game is really simple, it's not mine nor the aimbot's fault that you can't beat it

spare some stamina, get loot crates and use your time wisely, know how to aim and adjust bullet's speed and timer

Lotta thanks for MagicSteve and SpecialSet. Without them, this game wouldn't have birds,sounds, guns,other good stuffs
